Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-HX50V
Reviews.Author: John Christensen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera right before my cruise to Cozumel and I am very pleased with the quality of pictures.  The Zoom is amazing with the 30X optical lens and the resolution is very good at 20 mega-pixels.  This camera takes really good pics in low light situations too. It's a great camera for the price and perfect for traveling.One happy customer.JC

Reviews.Title: so happy with this camera
Reviews.Author: Julie Massé
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in replacement of my old 5 years camera and I really enjoy the new technologies as the zoom and the image quality. It hard to fail pictures with this camera!

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: Extra batteries are great so one is always charged. The camera takes great pictures on the automatic settings but you have to remember to pop the flash if needed.  I'm happy with the size and quality of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful, except the case is a little small. I'd love it.
Reviews.Author: cc8980
Reviews.Content: Wonderful, except the case is a little small. All the others are very good, esp. the batteries and the card reader-writer.  I'd love it.

Reviews.Title: Picture perfect
Reviews.Author: Linda Davis
Reviews.Content: This camera feels like it belongs in my mid-sized male hand.  I like the heft, which is not overbearing, and dimensions.  I never feel like it is about to squirt out of my grasp, a feeling most small, slickl digital cameras give me.  The only thing it cannot do in terms of transportability is fit in the pockets of my jeans.  It--and its supplied carrying case--fit in ALL other pants I wear.  For jeans, I must wear a belt and use the case's belt loop.The camera's pictures approach the quality of those from my DSLR.  (And I defer to the many positive technical reviews of this camera.)  I anticipate that there will be some diminution of quality with enlargements greater than 20X30.

Reviews.Title: All is ok
Reviews.Author: lila
Reviews.Content: i received all in good way, only ups have a minimun inconvenient, but i am happy with the cam, thanks amazon and focus camera, i  am complaced for the purchased

Reviews.Title: "forever" PROCESSING....
Reviews.Author: rreid
Reviews.Content: Camera took wonderful pictures. But the "forever" PROCESSING. ..  screen after the shots made the camera almost worthless. Even  100x zoom is worthless if a photographer misses 100 shots waiting for the camera to cycle. SONY knows better than placing this camera on the market!!!EXCELLENT service from the amazon seller. Fully understood my problem and refunded my purchase.
